title: Icon: color
code:
<gds-flex
  width="100%"
  padding="2xl"
  gap="m"
  flex-wrap="wrap"
  align-items="center"
  justify-content="center"
>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="primary"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">01</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">02</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="brand-01"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Brand 01</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="positive"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Positive</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="notice"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Notice</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="negative"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Negative</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>
